name: Ultimate Burger
description: Ah, burgers, one of the best reasons to look forward to summer! Discover the joy of homemade burgers and sink your teeth into this classic, juicy patty. With robust flavours of onion and garlic and a mild kick from some cayenne, we know you’ll agree that this burger is, indeed, ultimate! Round out your toppings with any of Epicure’s Sauces & Condiments.

ingredients.name: Burger Seasoning or Beef & Steak Seasoning
CCB Dip Mix or Cheesy Fries Seasoning
Buffalo Seasoning or Chipotle Aioli Mix

preparation: Whisk together egg (if using), mustard, ketchup, seasonings, and dip mix. Mix in beef. Wet hands to prevent sticking and form mixture into 6 patties.
Grill on the barbecue over medium-high heat with the lid closed for 5 minutes. Flip patties and continue grilling for an additional 5 minutes.
Split and toast buns, if desired. Tuck burgers into buns with additional toppings, if desired.
tips: Mix 1⁄4 cup Crispy & Crunchy Coating Mix or dry breadcrumbs into ground beef mixture for a more tender texture to your burgers.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup sliced veggies and 2 tbsp Epicure Dip.

products.name: Beef & Steak Seasoning
summary: Take simple grilled steaks and oven-roasted beef up a notch! Sprinkle this sodium-free blend liberally to complement the taste of the meat.

products.name: CCB Dip Mix
summary: Cheese. Chives. Bacon. How's that for a totally irresistible trio? Our very own smoky vegetarian bacon, made from pinto beans, is the secret star of this oh-so-yummy dip.
This blend is all about versatility and we recommend taking it way beyond the dip bowl—use CCB in any dish that could use a little levelling up.

products.name: Chipotle Aioli Mix
summary: Medium-spicy Southwestern flavor with noteworthy chipotle chili and smoked paprika. A crowd-pleasing condiment for your burgers, fries, fish tacos, burritos and anything else that needs a little extra kick.

products.name: Cheesy Fries Seasoning
summary: Who can resist restaurant-style cheesy fries? They’re even better when we bake them at home. Made with aromatic garlic, real Parmesan, and premium quality spices, this versatile seasoning is low in sodium, and free from gluten, artificial flavours, colours, and preservatives. Simply sprinkle it on fries, popcorn, pasta, or veggies for a healthy, cheesy family favorite.
